```{r}
#Read in the data
library(readxl)
reptile <- read_excel("czs_reptile.xls", col_names = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ds <- reptile
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(corrplot)
ds$`Taxonomy Family` <-as.factor(ds$`Taxonomy Family`)
ds$`Taxonomy Order` <- as.factor(ds$`Taxonomy Order`)
ds$`Birth Type` <- as.factor(ds$`Birth Type`)
ds$`Days held` <- (ds$`Days held`)/365
summary(ds)
```


```{r}
ggplot(czs_reptile, aes(x=`Taxonomy Order`, y = `Days held`, color=`Birth Type`)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```
```{r}

cor(czs_reptile$`Days held`, czs_reptile$`Birth Type`)
help(cor)
```
